title: PODCAST: Faster, supercomputer! Faster!
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, January 20, 2015
contentencoded: Some context on what the President might say tonight in regards to college tuition. Plus, Fidelity will reportedly lead the creation of a new private, stock trading venue, otherwise known as a dark pool. More on that. And Tennessee's Oak Ridge National Laboratory may once again be home to the world's fastest supercomputer. Its current machine was the fastest when it went live in 2012. That title only lasted six months - then a computer in China took the top spot. But the U.S. recently put aside more $400 million to keep itself in the race.

teaser: College tuition, a new dark pool, and making the fastest supercomputer.
description: College tuition, a new dark pool, and making the fastest supercomputer.
